front.title: ICMPv6 Echo Request/Reply for Enabled In-situ OAM Capabilities

abstract.t: This document describes the ICMPv6 IOAM Echo functionality, which uses the ICMPv6 IOAM Echo Request/Reply messages, allowing the IOAM encapsulating node to discover the enabled IOAM capabilities of each IOAM transit and decapsulating node. This document updates RFC 4884.
